# UIAlertController.Style.actionSheet

**Case**

An action sheet displayed by the view controller that presented it.

## Declaration

```swift
case actionSheet
```

## Discussion

Use an action sheet to present the user with a set of alternatives for how to proceed with a given task. You can also use this style to prompt the user to confirm a potentially dangerous action. This alert style isn’t supported by tvOS; use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertController/Style/alert] instead.

## Constants

- **UIAlertController.Style.alert**: An alert displayed modally for the app.
